# blaseRtemplates

## Installation

blaseRtemplates is available on our R-Universe repository.

You can install the latest version of blaseRtemplates like so:

``` r
install.packages('blaseRtemplates', repos = c('https://blaserlab.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```

Linux, mac and windows-compatible versions are available.

## Quick-Start Guide

1.  Establish a new installation of the blaseRtemplates directory
    structure.
    - will also modify the user-level .Renviron file

``` r
blaseRtemplates::establish_new_bt(cache_path = "<path/to/directory>/cache_r_4_2",
                                  project_path = "<path/to/directory>/projects")
```

1.  Switch to the new baseproject using the Rstudio project chooser.

2.  Initialize a new project in the same projects directory:

``` r
blaseRtemplates::initialize_project(path = "../project_name")
```

## For more information

See linked articles on:

- [establishing a new installation of blaseRtemplates for a single
  user](https://blaserlab.github.io/blaseRtemplates/articles/establish.html)
- [establishing a multi-user blaseRtemplates
  installation](https://blaserlab.github.io/blaseRtemplates/articles/multiuser.html)
- [initializing projects (de novo and from
  github)](https://blaserlab.github.io/blaseRtemplates/articles/initialize.html)
- [installing
  packages](https://blaserlab.github.io/blaseRtemplates/articles/install.html)
- [managing project
  data](https://blaserlab.github.io/blaseRtemplates/articles/project_data.html)
- [using
  git](https://blaserlab.github.io/blaseRtemplates/articles/using_git.html)

# Function reference

## All functions

- [bb_renv_datapkg()](bb_renv_datapkg.md) : Install Or Update A Local R
  Data Package

&nbsp;

- \>\>\>\>\>\>\> Stashed changes [`cache_fun()`](cache_fun.md) : cache a
  single package

&nbsp;

- [`catch_blasertemplates_root()`](catch_blasertemplates_root.md) : Make
  sure you are in a properly-formatted blaseRtemplates project.

&nbsp;

- [establish_new_bt()](establish_new_bt.md) : Establish a New
  blaseRtemplates Installation

&nbsp;

- [`find_unlinked_packages()`](find_unlinked_packages.md) : Find
  Unlinked Packages

[`fix_another_library()`](fix_another_library.md)
:   Fix a User-Project Library
:   Easily Initiate an renv Project

- [`easy_install()`](easy_install.md) : Easily Install Packages

&nbsp;

- [`easy_restore()`](easy_restore.md) : Easily restore a project from an
  RENV Lockfile

&nbsp;

- [`find_unlinked_packages()`](find_unlinked_packages.md) : Find
  Unlinked Packages

&nbsp;

- [`get_all_deps()`](get_all_deps.md) : get all package dependencies

&nbsp;

- [`get_new_library()`](get_new_library.md) : Get A New Project Library

&nbsp;

- [`git_easy_branch()`](git_easy_branch.md) : Easily Create or Switch
  Git Branches

&nbsp;

- [`git_push_all()`](git_push_all.md) : Push to All Remotes

&nbsp;

- [`git_rewind_to()`](git_rewind_to.md) : Rewind Git History

&nbsp;

- [`git_safe_merge()`](git_safe_merge.md) : Safely Merge your Working
  Branch

&nbsp;

- [`git_update_branch()`](git_update_branch.md) : Update a Working Git
  Branch

&nbsp;

- [`gitcreds_set()`](gitcreds_set.md) : Interactively Set Github PAT

&nbsp;

- [`hash_fun()`](hash_fun.md) : Hash a single package

[`hash_n_cache()`](hash_n_cache.md)

hash one or more functions and then cache them and update the catalogs.
Default permissions are set to 777.

[`initialize_github()`](initialize_github.md)
:   Initialize A Project By Forking A Github Repo
:   hash one or more functions and then cache them and update the
    catalogs

- [`initialize_package()`](initialize_package.md) : Initialize a Package
  Using a Standard Template

&nbsp;

- [`initialize_project()`](initialize_project.md) : Create a package or
  project using a structured template

&nbsp;

- [install_datapackage_2()](install_datapackage_2.md) : Install a data
  package

&nbsp;

- \>\>\>\>\>\>\> Stashed changes
  [`install_one_package()`](install_one_package.md) : Install One
  Package

&nbsp;

- [`link_deps()`](link_deps.md) : link package dependencies

&nbsp;

- [`link_one_new_package()`](link_one_new_package.md) : link one new
  package

&nbsp;

- [`project_data()`](project_data.md) : Activate Project Data

&nbsp;

- [`rec_get_deps()`](rec_get_deps.md) : recursively get package
  dependencies

&nbsp;

- [regenerate_bt_configs()](regenerate_bt_configs.md) : Regenerate
  .Rprofile and .Renviron Files

&nbsp;

- ======= \>\>\>\>\>\>\> Stashed changes
  [`regenerate_git_commands()`](regenerate_git_commands.md) : Regenerate
  a Git Commands File

&nbsp;

- [`reset_prompt()`](reset_prompt.md) : Reset Your Console Prompt

&nbsp;

- [`setup_git_collab()`](setup_git_collab.md) : Install Scripts to
  Support Git Collaboration

&nbsp;

- [sync_cache()](sync_cache.md) : Synchronize Project Library with Renv
  Cache

&nbsp;

- \>\>\>\>\>\>\> Stashed changes
  [`update_dependency_catalog()`](update_dependency_catalog.md) : update
  the dependency catalog

&nbsp;

- [`update_package_catalog()`](update_package_catalog.md) :
  rewrite/update the package catalog

&nbsp;

- [upgrade_bt()](upgrade_bt.md) : Upgrade a Project to Use the Latest
  Version of BlaseRtemplates

&nbsp;

- \>\>\>\>\>\>\> Stashed changes
  [`write_project_library_catalog()`](write_project_library_catalog.md)
  : Write A New Project Library Catalog
